fields.summary: iOS: Titanium.Media.Sound: play() results in one second delay before sound play

fields.description:
Sounds delay up to a full second before playing.

Device Results:

Nexus One 2.2.2 - Good performance.
Droid3 2.3.4 - Full second delay.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Run SoundTest attached.

2. Press sound buttons, make note of delay.

Expected Result:

Near instant sound play.

Actual Result:

One second delay.
fields.summary: Android: Titanium.Media.Sound: play() results in one second delay before sound play
fields.environment:
SDK: 1.8.1 githash=a24502a, 1.9.0.v20120207171634
Android: V8
Studio: 1.0.8.201201262211
OS: Lion
Devices Tested: Nexus One 2.2.2, Droid3 2.3.4

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress.
